Class WindowManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • start.WindowManager
  • public class WindowManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager of fxml file formats to show on the screen.
    Author:
    Brandon Heck

    • Method Detail

      • displayOperation

        public void displayOperation​(java.lang.String alert,
                             int quantity,
                             java.lang.String message)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Alert box to alert the user that an operation has occurred.
        Parameters:
        alert - Alert type to alert the user of.
        quantity - number specific codes or identifiable alert boxes.
        message - Message to relay to the user about the operation that has occurred.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the error fxml is missing or corrupted.

      • enterDetails

        public void enterDetails​(ItemType itemType)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        After required information of a product is entered . prompt to enter further information about the type of object to be provided.
        Parameters:
        itemType - Type of Item properties for the user to enter.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the information fxml is missing or corrupted.

      • enterPassword

        public void enterPassword()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        When a password is required prompt the password field . so that the user may enter the required password.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the password fxml is missing or corrupted.

      • closeError

        public void closeError()
        When the error Window is open close the window to go away.

      • setUserOfPassword

        public void setUserOfPassword​(java.lang.String user)
        Set the User Of Password for when password is required.
        Parameters:
        user - String of username to appear on window.
